name: Indiana Jones' Greatest Adventures (Wii)
description:
Grab your trusty whip and slash your way through all three Indy classics
in this no-thrills-barred adventure. If it happened in the movies, it
happens here: the giant boulder from Raiders of the Lost Ark, the
mine-cart chase from Temple of Doom, the three trials from Last Crusade,
Rene Belloq and Colonel Vogel – it's three times the action, all in one
fully loaded game.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
